sentences.english: The 100 over-water bungalows perch on stilts above the turquoise lagoon.
sentences.chinese: 在100個水平房鱸魚上方的綠松石瀉湖高蹺。

sentences.english: Coral reef red hind fish are a member of the grouper or sea bass family.
sentences.chinese: 紅珊瑚魚後的石斑或鱸魚的家庭成員。

sentences.english: Would you like to have the sea bass poached or sautéed?
sentences.chinese: 您的海鱸魚要用水煮還是用煎的？

sentences.english: Place the sea bass fillets onto the cucumbers and red radish. Add veal sauce and serve.
sentences.chinese: 海鱸魚柳鋪在青瓜及小蘿蔔上，加上黑醋燒汁即可。

sentences.english: Poached sea bass fillet with German wine, potatoes, cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 水煮海鱸魚配德國白葡萄酒，土豆，捲心菜。

sentences.english: North American freshwater bass resembling the larger marine striped bass.
sentences.chinese: 北美洲淡水鱸魚，外形象大的條紋石瓰。

sentences.english: When it comes to bass fishing, rods are pretty important.
sentences.chinese: 路亞鱸魚，竿子非常重要。

sentences.english: Here is one fishing for pickerel with grown perch for bait.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一位，是用大鱸魚來釣梭魚的。

sentences.english: Eat up: low-mercury "yes" fish such as sardines, wild salmon and farmed striped bass.
sentences.chinese: 可以喫低汞魚類，比如沙丁魚，野生鮭魚和養殖鱸魚。

sentences.english: They are the top bait for perch and crappie, and one of the best for bass .
sentences.chinese: 他們是頂部爲誘餌鱸魚和帳，其中最好的低音。

sentences.english: There are large numbers of Redfish until mid morning.
sentences.chinese: 還有大批鱸魚直到上午中旬。

sentences.english: The bird flew down from its perch in the cage.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒飛下來與其在籠子鱸魚。

sentences.english: This is steamed bass, and this is fried scorpion.
sentences.chinese: 這是清蒸鱸魚，這是油炸蠍子。

sentences.english: Score sea bass fillets gently &season with chopped thyme.
sentences.chinese: 輕切海鱸魚柳並加百里香調味。

sentences.english: If you can't be a muskie then just be a bass.
sentences.chinese: 如果你成不了大梭魚那就做一條鱸魚。

definition: grouper (Portuguese: garoupa)/also called 鮨/Epinephelinae (subfamily of Serranidae, fish family including grouper)
umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
